purpose: To illustrate semiconductor supply and demand conditions over the next quarters.
title: Semiconductor supply conditions are expected to remain tight over the next four quarters as demand growth continues to accelerate

bullets.text: Meeting the expected 8% growth in semiconductor demand in 2021 will require average global manufacturing utilization to reach at least 90%, the highest since 2010

supporting_facts: Demand and supply forecasts are based on device OEM revenue forecasts and fab construction projects.
reasoning_strategy: Data-driven analysis based on historical and forecasted figures.
